newsitem.title: USA: Sun Microsystems' Java initiative supported.
newsitem.headline: Sun Microsystems' Java initiative supported.

text.p: Sun Microsystems Inc said more than 100 companies Wednesday announced their support for its 100 percent Pure Java initiative, a Sun-led effort to help software developers build, market and sell 100 percent Pure Java applications that can be written once and run anywhere.
Among the companies that announced their support for the initiative were International Business Machines Corp, Apple Computer Inc and Netscape Communications Corp, Sun said.
Sun said the support will help guarantee Java programs written will run on any Java Compatible virtual machine.
